title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 250.3 - SERA; board; chairperson
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 250.3 - SERA; board; chairperson

State Regulations

The term SERA, as used herein, shall mean the New York

State Employment Relations Act, and the term s board or agency shall mean the

New York State Public Employment Relations Board. The terms chairperson or
chair shall mean the chairperson thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

250.3

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
